Package homework1

Class Account

java.lang.Object
homework1.Account
public class Account extends Object
Account class contains each users information that are username, birthdate, location, posts, messages, followed accounts, following accounts, blocked accounts and whether the user is logged in or not.

    • Account

      public Account(int newId, String newUsername, int newBirthDay, int newBirthMonth, int newBirthYear, String newLocation)
      Constructor of the Account object.
      Parameters:
      newId - id of the user.
      newUsername - username of the user.
      newBirthDay - users birthday day.
      newBirthMonth - users birthday month.
      newBirthYear - users birthday year.
      newLocation - location of the user, ex: "Istanbul".

    • follow

      public void follow(Account a)
      Adds a in the following array. and adds this account to the followers array of the followed account.
      Parameters:
      a - followed account.

    • block

      public void block(Account a)
      calls unfollow for each of account with parameter of the other and adds a to the blocked array of this account.
      Parameters:
      a - account that is blocked.

    • unblock

      public void unblock(Account a)
      Removes account a from the blocked array of this account.
      Parameters:
      a - account that is unblocked.

      Removes account a from the following array and removes this account from the followers array of account a.
      Parameters:
      a - account that is unfollowed.

    • viewPosts

      public void viewPosts(Account a)
      Shows the posts of the account a if this account is logged in and is not blocked by a.
      Parameters:
      a - Account whose posts will be viewed.
